title: PBE account
body:
I have a doubt, I would like to know how long they last in giving the pbe account. I have been waiting for 6 months and it still does not reach me :(.
And if you use google translate xd {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: The time it takes to get accepted is indeterminable, and not something we can force or expedite.  As long as you've applied through the[ application site](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe), all one can do is wait.  Best of luck with your admissions!
